name: unskilfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that lacks skill: Unlike your predecessors who lied so effectively, you lie very unskilfully. The surgery had been performed so unskillfully that she had to have a second operation.
More examplesFewer examplesShe discovered that even while swimming unskilfully, she felt better, looked better, and had more energy.If we act unskilfully, we could have zero economic growth, which would be a disaster.They were entirely inexperienced in war, and used their primitive weapons unskillfully.
